account.title: Account
account.logout_confirm_desc: Do you really want to logOut?
account.sync_desc: Sync your progress across all your devices. Don't lose your stats if you change your phone.
account.works_without_account: The app works fully without an account.
account.cloud_sync_desc: Progress is stored on this device and synced with the cloud.
account.local_desc: Progress is stored on this device.
